title: Part 154 - Services for Pupils with Limited English Proficiency
content:
Part 154 - Services for Pupils with Limited English Proficiency

State Regulations

Subpart 154-1 - SERVICES FOR PUPILS WITH LIMITED ENGLISH PROFICIENCY FOR PROGRAMS OPERATED PRIOR TO THE 2015-2016 SCHOOL YEAR (ยง 154-1.1 to 154-1.3)

Subpart 154-2 - Services for English Language Learners for Programs Operated in the 2015-2016 School Year and Thereafter (ยง 154-2.1 to 154-2.4)

Subpart 154-3 - IDENTIFICATION AND EXIT PROCEDURES FOR STUDENTS WITH DISABILITIES FOR ENGLISH LANGUAGE LEARNER PROGRAMS OPERATED IN THE 2015-2016 SCHOOL YEAR AND THEREAFTER (ยง 154-3.1 to 154-3.4)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
